# smtt-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute          | Description                                                             | Type                                                   | Default     |
| ---------------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `alignment`      | `alignment`        | Alignment of button content                                             | `"center" \| "left" \| "right"`                        | `undefined` |
| `btnType`        | `btn-type`         |                                                                         | `"ghost" \| "outline" \| "solid"`                      | `'solid'`   |
| `button`         | --                 | reference to the button element                                         | `HTMLElement`                                          | `undefined` |
| `disabled`       | `disabled`         | Wether the button is disabled or not                                    | `boolean`                                              | `false`     |
| `fullHeight`     | `full-height`      | Whether or not the button should fill the height of its parent          | `boolean`                                              | `false`     |
| `fullWidth`      | `full-width`       | Whether or not the button should fill the width of its parent           | `boolean`                                              | `false`     |
| `noBorderRadius` | `no-border-radius` | give the button square borders                                          | `boolean`                                              | `false`     |
| `size`           | `size`             | The size of the button                                                  | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                 | `'md'`      |
| `type`           | `type`             | The type of button (corresponds to type property of native html button) | `"button" \| "confirm" \| "submit"`                    | `'button'`  |
| `variation`      | `variation`        | color theme to be applied to the button e.g primary                     | `"default" \| "destructive" \| "primary" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
